title: Unchained Alistar
body:
Hey, I'm just wondering, how do you unlock the Unchained {{champion:12}} if you are on a Oceania Server. I know there are certain links to get you the page, but that required you to log in on a NA Server. There is no option for a Oceania Server or at least I haven't found it yet.

If you could tell me how to unlock the skin while staying on a Oceania account that would be great. Also if you have not figured out a way or have had no luck, please share this information with the rest of us who may be curious. That would be great.

replies.body: Just send a ticket to support. They'll manually add it to your account.
Thanks, I finally received a response from one of the RIOT members and as you said, they added it to my account. Thanks for the advice.
you can not get unchained alistar on oce
False. You can't get it the normal way on OCE but you can still get it.

send a support ticket.

with an ms paint picture. this is the most important part.
